articles.author: Benjamin Hochman
articles.title: Hochman: Disappointing decision by Cardinals' Paul Goldschmidt, Nolan Arenado could affect playoffs - St. Louis Post-Dispatch
articles.description: If the Cardinals and Blue Jays both make the playoffs, will they then get the vaccine, in case the Cards make the World Series against Toronto?
articles.content: If the St. Louis Cardinals make it to the World Series and play the Toronto Blue Jays currently the team with the third-best record in the American League unvaccinated All-Stars Paul Goldschmidt and … [+4612 chars]

articles.title: Eagles training camp 2022: Pre-camp 53-man roster projection - NBC Sports
articles.description: Here's a 53-man roster projection as the Eagles prepare for their 2022 training camp. By Dave Zangaro
articles.content:
The Eagles report for training camp this week with a roster of 90 players.
They have to be down to 53 in just a few weeks when they go into the 2022 season so theres plenty of work to do.
This year… [+7157 chars]

articles.author: Patrick Hipes
articles.title: XFL Finalizes 2023 Season Kickoff Plans, Which Don’t Include L.A. Or New York - Deadline
articles.description: The XFL, the spring pro football league fronted by Dwayne Johnson and Dany Garcia, took a big step toward finalizing its plans Sunday with a press conference that revealed the cities, venues and head coaches for its upcoming 2023 season. The regular season is…
